description: A Poisonous bird Youkai who was a childhood friend of Rikuo, he was disappointed the Rikuo had become so soft. His species has short lifespan and as a result he has become very weak, but he specializes in making medicine. After being betrayed and nearly killed he was rescued by "Night" Rikuo, he continues to support Rikuo and is the first to exchange Sakazuki and tells him to form a new "Hyakki Yakou".He was on board of Takarabune and poured his medicine on Kubinashi and Itaku to stop their battle. Rikuo later punch him.
name: Zen
